mapper.select: SELECT tp.prod_id as productId , prod_img_url_m as imgUrl ,prod_name as productName ,prod_price as productCost,prod_url_m as detailUrl , partner_name as channelName , brand , logo_url as logoUrl , company as productMake,case when uf.prod_id is null then 'N' else 'Y' end favoriteYn FROM tb_visual_shopping_result vsr INNER JOIN tb_product tp ON vsr.prod_id = tp.prod_id LEFT JOIN (select prod_id from user_favorite where user_key = #{userKey,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) uf on tp.prod_id = uf.prod_id WHERE result_id = #{imgIdStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECt max(depth_no) as visualMax FROM public.tb_visual_shopping
